name: linkdump
body:
### 2013-01-18

* [watson](http://goosecode.com/watson/)

   _a tool for creating and tracking bug reports, issues, and internal notes in code_

* [Errbit](http://errbit.github.io/errbit/)

   _a tool for collecting and managing errors from other applications._

* [Serf](http://www.serfdom.io/)

   _decentralized solution for service discovery and orchestration_

* [Sky Open Source, Behavioral Database](http://skydb.io/)

   _used for flexible, high performance analysis of... certain kinds of data such as clickstream data and log data_

* [Duktape](http://duktape.org/)

   _embeddable Javascript engine, with a focus on portability and compact footprint_

### 2013-12-26

Advent Calendars

*  [SysAdvent](http://sysadvent.blogspot.com/)

    _System Administration_

*  [Perl Advent Calendar 2013](http://perladvent.pm.org/2013/)

    _Perl, presumably_

*  [MDN Holidays calendar 2013](http://thewebrocks.com/mdncalendar2013/)

    _Mozilla Developer Network_

*  [24 Ways](http://24ways.org/)

    _Web design and development_

### 2013-12-23

*   [List of minimalist frameworks](https://github.com/neiesc/ListOfMinimalistFrameworks)

    _Sinatra (Ruby), Express (Node), Bottle (Python) et al._

*   [List of Free Programming Books](http://resrc.io/list/10/list-of-free-programming-books/)

    _Insanely long_

*   [Dictdiffer](https://github.com/fatiherikli/dictdiffer)

    _Diff and patch Python dictionaries_

*   [Automated installation of the Microsoft IE App Compat virtual machines](http://xdissent.github.io/ievms/)

    _Microsoft provides virtual machine disk images to facilitate website testing in multiple versions of IE, regardless of the host operating system_

*   [Automating with convention: Introducing sub](http://37signals.com/svn/posts/3264-automating-with-convention-introducing-sub)

    _Sub is a model for setting up shell programs that use subcommands, like git or rbenv using bash_
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
